00020 #ifndef _XENO_NUCLEUS_INTR_H
00021 #define _XENO_NUCLEUS_INTR_H
00022 
00023 #include <nucleus/types.h>
00024 
00025 /* Possible return values of ISR. */
00026 #define XN_ISR_NONE      0x1
00027 #define XN_ISR_HANDLED   0x2
00028 /* Additional bits. */
00029 #define XN_ISR_PROPAGATE 0x100
00030 #define XN_ISR_NOENABLE  0x200
00031 #define XN_ISR_BITMASK   ~0xff
00032 
00033 /* Creation flags. */
00034 #define XN_ISR_SHARED    0x1
00035 #define XN_ISR_EDGE      0x2
00036 
00037 /* Operational flags. */
00038 #define XN_ISR_ATTACHED  0x10000
00039 
00040 #if defined(__KERNEL__) || defined(__XENO_UVM__) || defined(__XENO_SIM__)
00041 
00042 typedef struct xnintr {
00043 
00044 #if defined(CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SHIRQ_LEVEL) || defined(CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SHIRQ_EDGE)
00045     struct xnintr *next; /* !< Next object in the IRQ-sharing chain. */
00046 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SHIRQ_LEVEL || CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SHIRQ_EDGE */
00047 
00048     xnisr_t isr;        /* !< Interrupt service routine. */
00049 
00050     void *cookie;       /* !< User-defined cookie value. */
00051 
00052     unsigned long hits; /* !< Number of receipts (since attachment). */
00053 
00054     xnflags_t flags;    /* !< Creation flags. */
00055 
00056     unsigned irq;       /* !< IRQ number. */
00057 
00058     xniack_t iack;      /* !< Interrupt acknowledge routine. */
00059 
00060     const char *name;   /* !< Symbolic name. */
00061 
00062 } xnintr_t;
00063 
00064 extern xnintr_t nkclock;
00065 
00066 #ifdef __cplusplus
00067 extern "C" {
00068 #endif
00069 
00070 int xnintr_mount(void);
00071 
00072 void xnintr_clock_handler(void);
00073 
00074 int xnintr_irq_proc(unsigned int irq, char *str);
00075 
00076     /* Public interface. */
00077 
00078 int xnintr_init(xnintr_t *intr,
00079                 const char *name,
00080                 unsigned irq,
00081                 xnisr_t isr,
00082                 xniack_t iack,
00083                 xnflags_t flags);
00084 
00085 int xnintr_destroy(xnintr_t *intr);
00086 
00087 int xnintr_attach(xnintr_t *intr,
00088                   void *cookie);
00089 
00090 int xnintr_detach(xnintr_t *intr);
00091 
00092 int xnintr_enable(xnintr_t *intr);
00093 
00094 int xnintr_disable(xnintr_t *intr);
00095     
00096 xnarch_cpumask_t xnintr_affinity(xnintr_t *intr,
00097                                  xnarch_cpumask_t cpumask);
00098 
00099 #ifdef __cplusplus
00100 }
00101 #endif
00102 
00103 #endif /* __KERNEL__ || __XENO_UVM__ || __XENO_SIM__ */

00105 #endif /* !_XENO_NUCLEUS_INTR_H */
